A Lausanne, havres de paix et temples du: In Lausanne, havens of peace and temples of well-being are legion for those who like to unwind. Baths, spas, hammams and swimming pools are particularly popular with locals in search of relaxation. You can be sure that all will be well...
A Lausanne, nombre de projets et d'initi: In Lausanne, many projects and initiatives are developed to enhance green spaces and protect the environment. Issues such as responsible mobility, waste management and ecotourism are at the heart of the city's concerns.
A la faveur d'infrastructures performant: With its high-performance infrastructure and enchanting setting, Lausanne offers a wealth of opportunities for both indoor and outdoor physical exercise. Whether you prefer a nautical, Alpine or urban environment, there's a wide range of choices available to you, each more attractive than the last.
À la fois urbaine et balnéaire, entre la: Both an urban and a lakeside resort, between lake, mountains, vineyards and forests, Lausanne captivates with its easy-going lifestyle. Voted best small city in the world, it boasts all the characteristics of a metropolis on a human scale.
Aucune autorisation n'est nécessaire si: No authorisation is required if the drone weighs less than 250g. Above that weight, authorisation must be obtained from Blécherette airport

Culture : Lausanne, une ville à visiter: Culture: Lausanne, a city after your own art
En 2024, Lausanne et son esprit olympiqu: In 2024, Lausanne and its Olympic spirit are honoured by the New York Times.
En cas d'occupation accrue du domaine pu: In the event of increased occupation of the public domain, please contact the Lausanne Tourisme press office.
En matière d'éducation, la Capitale vaud: When it comes to education, the Vaud capital boasts a number of Europe's leading universities and colleges, including the Lausanne Federal Institute of Technology (EPFL), UNIL, the Lausanne University of Art and Design (ECAL) and the École Hôtelière de Lausanne (EHL).
En plus de bénéficier d'un environnement: As well as boasting an exceptional natural environment, between lake and mountains, the 350 hectares of parks and gardens that flourish here also make Lausanne one of the greenest cities in the world.
En tant que journaliste ou créateur de c: As a journalist or content creator, would you like to find out more about Lausanne and its possibilities? Don't hesitate to contact us by filling in the form below. We will do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.
Fin 2019, Monocle - le réputé magazine b: At the end of 2019, Monocle – the renowned British lifestyle magazine – named Lausanne "Best Small City in the World".
Hum. Une erreur s'est produite. Veuillez: Ahem. An error has occurred. Please try again later.
Identifiez @thelausanner en story et en: Identify @thelausanner in your story and post, and use the hashtag #thelausanner in your post.
Il faut reconnaitre que la belle vaudois: It has to be said that the beautiful Vaud city has managed to carve out a place for itself among the greatest, not least by accumulating world records. Not only is Lausanne one of the top 52 destinations to visit according to the NY Times, it was also voted "Best Small City in the World" by  famous British magazine Monocle. No less!
Il n'y a pas d'autorisation spécifique p: No specific authorisation is required for filming in Lausanne. However, consent must be obtained when filming identifiable people. It is also important, when filming in the public space, to facilitate the movement of local residents and not to disrupt road traffic.
Ils pensent que Lausanne est la plus ver: They think that Lausanne is the greenest of green cities – and for good reason!
Insolite : Lausanne hors des sentiers ba: Unusual: Lausanne off the beaten track
La demande doit être effectuée au moins: The request must be made at least 3 working days before the day of the flight.
Lausanne est facilement accessible : par: Lausanne is easily accessible: by rail (SBB network, direct Eurocity and TGV from Paris and Milan), by road (A1/E25 and A9/E27 motorways), by air (60 km from Geneva International Airport, a 45-minute drive or train ride), and by water, thanks to the boats of the Compagnie Générale de Navigation on Lake Geneva.
Lausanne, Capitale vaudoise aux milles c: Lausanne, the capital of the canton of Vaud, is certainly a city of a thousand colours, but also of a thousand flavours! Since explorations work up an appetite, why not treat yourself to a gourmet break with the sweet flavours of yesteryear?
Lausanne, ville nature mais aussi ville: Lausanne, a city of nature, but also a city of culture! With its rich and vibrant cultural scene, Lausanne has nothing to envy the world's capitals. Throughout the year, exhibitions, shows, concerts and festivals keep the city's heart beating, as well as that of Lausanners, who live to the rhythm and colours of its cultural seasons.
Le New York Times recommande Lausanne da: The New York Times recommends Lausanne in its authoritative list of 52 places to go to.

Les Lausanners parlent en long et en lar: The Lausanners talk at length about their love of walks that are just a stone's throw away.

Légendes urbaines, anecdotes, fun facts,: Urban legends, anecdotes, fun facts, oddities... Lausanne has secrets aplenty. Embark on an unusual tour to discover the many charms and mysteries of the Vaud capital.

Pour toutes demandes de tournage se situ: All requests for filming in private areas (e.g. museums, restaurants, etc.) must be submitted to the establishment for authorisation. The request must be made a few days in advance.

Qui de mieux que des locaux pour vous fa: Who better than locals to show you Lausanne in an authentic and passionate way?
Qui dit visites de presse, demandes ou é: Media trips, media requests, media events and promotional activities all generate media coverage. Let's take a look at the latest articles published in the national and international press, which are raising the profile of our destination around the world.
Recevez les bons plans de Lausanne: Receive the best tips from Lausanne
Retrouvez ici les dernières nouvelles de: Find the latest news from Lausanne here, as well as press kits and releases from Lausanne Tourisme.
Retrouvez les articles et retombées médi: Find out about the articles and media coverage dedicated to Lausanne as a destination and published on the various European and international markets. They are the result of various actions undertaken by the Lausanne Tourist Office with the support of its partners.
Riche de ses nombreux parcs, jardins et: With its many parks, gardens and playgrounds, Lausanne is a particularly popular city for families. Culture is widely accessible to the youngest visitors, and there are an increasing number of child-friendly restaurants, cafés and accommodation.
Sport : à Lausanne, ça match !: Sport: In Lausanne, it’s a perfect match!
Sublime étendue bleue déployée au pied d: The largest freshwater lake in Western Europe – and undoubtedly the most romantic – is a sublime blue expanse at the foot of the mountains, giving Lausanne its irresistible charm. Swimming, sailing, water sports... Lake Geneva also offers a wide range of leisure activities, to our great delight.

We are keen to share with you our passion and all the resources we have at our disposal to tell the story of Lausanne in the best possible way.
Vous êtes journaliste ou créateur de con: Are you a journalist or content creator looking for more information about our destination? On this site, you'll find all the resources you need for your publications: media library, news, press releases, media texts, key figures, media trip forms, etc.

page.articles.description: Explore Lausanne and uncover its richness through inspiring articles and insightful tips from locals for a unique experience of the city.
page.articles.title: Articles
page.contact.description: As a journalist or content creator, would you like to find out more about Lausanne and its possibilities? Don't hesitate to contact us.

page.coverage.title: Media coverage
page.highlights.description: Live the Lausanne adventure to the fullest: don’t miss any of its must-sees or news, and make your stay with us an unforgettable experience!
page.highlights.title: Must-sees and new features
page.home.description: Discover Lausanne with Lausanne Tourisme, your go-to source for regional information. Visit our Media Space dedicated to journalists and audiovisual media.
page.home.title: Media corner

page.theme.architecture.description: Lausanne may seem disparate at first, but a keen eye reveals the city's evolution over time through its diverse architectural styles.
page.theme.architecture.title: Architecture and design: Lausanne aesthetics
page.theme.culture.description: In Lausanne, culture is expressed in many forms throughout the year, offering great enjoyment to enthusiasts.
page.theme.culture.title: Culture: Lausanne, a city to visit after your own art
page.theme.education.description: When it comes to education, the Vaud capital boasts a number of Europe's leading universities and colleges
page.theme.education.title: Education: Lausanne, a city open to the world
page.theme.family.description: Young and old explorers will discover the city's treasures through fun and interactive activities for the whole family.
page.theme.family.title: Family: Lausanne – family fun
page.theme.gastronomy.description: Since explorations work up an appetite, why not treat yourself to a gourmet break with the sweet flavours of yesteryear?
page.theme.gastronomy.title: Gastronomy: Savour Lausanne
page.theme.lacustrine.description: Swimming, sailing, water sports... Lake Geneva also offers a wide range of leisure activities, to our great delight.
page.theme.lacustrine.title: Lausanne and Lake Geneva
page.theme.nature.description: As well as boasting an exceptional natural environment, between lake and mountains, the 350 hectares of parks and gardens that flourish here also make Lausanne one of the greenest cities in the world.
page.theme.nature.title: Nature: Lausanne, the green city
page.theme.sport.description: On land or on water, at the summit or in the air, ideally nestled between mountains and lake, the pearl of Lake Geneva alternately becomes a paradise for both athletes and creatives.
page.theme.sport.title: Sport: In Lausanne, we take a breather!
page.theme.sustainability.description: Visitors especially appreciate the cleanliness, respect for nature, the enhancement of green spaces, and the city's efforts to combat nuisances.
page.theme.sustainability.title: Sustainability: Lausanne, a green city
page.theme.unusual.description: Discovering Lausanne through its most visible assets is classic, but seeking to uncover its most original, even unique, aspects is just as important.
page.theme.unusual.title: Unusual: Lausanne off the beaten track
page.theme.wellness.description: In Lausanne, day visitors or lifelong residents happily breathe the fresh mountain air while gazing at the divine expanse of the lake.
page.theme.wellness.title: Well-being: Lausanne rejuvenating baths
page.themes.description: Here you can discover all that Lausanne has to offer, as well as sound advice from the Lausanners.
page.themes.title: Themes
À la fois sportive, culturelle et gourma: Sporting, cultural, gourmet, modern, sustainable and full of history, Lausanne shines and stands out in many ways. Here you can discover all that Lausanne has to offer, as well as sound advice from the Lausanners.
Éclectique, Lausanne l'est aussi au trav: Lausanne is also eclectic in terms of the richness and diversity of its architecture. At times Belle Epoque or Art Deco, at others unusual, contemporary or futuristic... One thing's for sure: lovers of buildings and beautiful layouts are in for a treat.
Éducation : Lausanne, ville ouverte sur: Education: Lausanne, a city open to the world
